scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:landing" "npm run dev:citizen" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:landing: cd landing-page && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run build:landing && npm run build:citizen && npm run build:admin && npm run combine:builds
scripts.build:landing: cd landing-page && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:citizen: cd citizen-portal && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: cd admin-dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../landing-page && npm install && cd ../citizen-portal && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install && cd ..
